thread.title: Football Player of the Week: North Side's Logan Capps - Week 6
thread.title_full: Football Player of the Week: North Side's Logan Capps - Week 6

title: Football Player of the Week: North Side's Logan Capps - Week 6
text:
Football Player of the Week: North Side's Logan Capps - Week 6 
By WISE Web News October 1, 2015 Updated Oct 1, 2015 at 11:52 PM EDT 
FORT WAYNE, Ind. (21Alive) - The 21Alive/Parkview Sports Medicine High School Football Player of the Week for Week 6 is North Side's Logan Capps. 
Capps plays running back on offense, safety on defense and kicker on special teams. 
Logan rushed for 145 yards and 3 touchdowns, and added a passing touchdown, too. 
He also recovered a fumble on defense, which set up one his offensive touchdowns. 
Capps is busy for the Redskins, wrestling in the winter and playing baseball in the spring. What are your thoughts CLICK HERE to leave us a "QUESTION OF THE DAY” comment.
